column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: ship. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/> . ex:Ship rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:MerchantShip rdf:type rdfs:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ship .ex:CruiseShip rdf:type rdfs:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ship . ex:NavyShip rdf:type rdfs:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Ship . ex:hasCaptain rdf:type rdf:Property ;   rdfs:domain ex:Ship ;   rdfs:range ex:Human . ex:hasCrew rdf:type rdf:Property ;   rdfs:domain ex:Ship ;   rdfs:range ex:Human . ex:hasPassenger rdf:type rdf:Property ;   rdfs:domain ex:Ship ;   rdfs:range ex:Human . ex:operatedBy rdf:type rdf:Property ;   rdfs:domain ex:Ship ;   rdfs:range ex:Company . ex:Human rdf:type rdfs:Class . ex:Company rdf:type rdfs:Class .```
